But here’s a properly chunky Black Friday discount on the most endearingly out-there Steam Deck rival to date, the Lenovo Legion Go: the 512GB model has shed hundreds of pounds/dollaridoos to fall all the way to £479 / $500. That’s really not a lot for something that goes full luxe on its display and build quality, not to mention its party trick of letting the two controller sections split off, Nintendo-switch style, with one acting as a portable mouse.
This is also the cheapest that the Legion Go has ever gone, at least in the UK, so could make a good pickup if you’ve been wanting something with more power than the Steam Deck range but have been put off by the Legion Go or Asus ROG Ally X’s high launch pricing.
Read more
articles.title: Speaking of Black Friday handheld PC deals, here’s the Lenovo Legion Go at its lowest price ever

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
Happy Black Friday, I definitely don’t say with a gun pressed into my spine. These days, of course, Black Friday sort of just starts whenever retailers feel like it, which is why we’ve already seen the kind of Steam Deck microSD deals that I’d have normally spent this morning writing up. Instead, here’s an alternate for the more eager screwdriverists among you: up to 50% off the Crucial P310, currently our top pick of the recent breed of Steam Deck replacement SSDs.
Read more
articles.title: Black Friday is here, and so is the best Steam Deck SSD at up to 50% off

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
I greatly enjoyed tooting with my mouse in Trombone Champ on a flat monitor, but in retrospect it's the perfect candidate for conversion to virtual reality. It's small in scope, for one, but also VR would let you see through the eyes of the tooter and slide your trombone note up and down by holding the motion controllers up to your face.

So it is in Trombone Champ: Unflattened, a VR spin-off that's out now.

 
Read more
articles.title: Trombone Champ: Unflattened is out now, letting you toot your own trombone in VR

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
It's almost the end of November, which means it is technically but not spiritually still autumn. It is spiritually winter, the season of wearing gloves and using my phone's flashlight to look for my dog's poos in the long grass. Yet it's not the Steam winter sale that started yesterday, but the Steam autumn sale. 

Discounts are definitely never a bad thing, but Steam sales used to feel like big events on the PC gaming calendar. They don't anymore, to me. Friends, are Steam sales still exciting to you?

 
Read more
articles.title: RPS Asks: Are Steam sales still as exciting as they used to be?

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
In Ndemic Creations' mobile strategy sim Plague Inc, you nurture a disease and attempt to spread it across the world. Originally launched in 2012, the game saw a morbid upsurge in popularity during the early years of Covid, as millions of people sought to model the pandemic's advance or just play out their anxieties. Perhaps seeking to wash away any lingering bad karma, Ndemic have now unveiled After Inc: Revival, a blend of city builder and miniature 4X set in the aftermath of a zombie apocalypse. In Plague Inc, you brought the world to an end; now, you must grow it anew from the wreckage.
 
Read more
articles.title: The creators of pandemic sim Plague Inc are back with 4X city builder After Inc: Revival

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl challenges you to survive the Zone, a land where the rules of nature are more like half-hearted suggestions and death may come from a mutant’s fang as quickly as a bandit’s bullet. But what if you could not only survive it, but tame it?
I am Bohdan Beastmaster, aspiring wrangler of all the radiation-twisted insults to God that occupy the Zone. One of its rogue Artifacts exploded my flat, and rather than find a place on SpareRoom, I’ve gone for the easier and safer option of venturing into the wilds of Chornobyl – armed not with rusty AKs or scavenged grenades but the teeth and claws of my mutant soon-to-be companions. The absence of any actual fauna-influencing tools or techniques only makes my plan even simpler: find beasts, aggro beasts onto human enemies, win.
Read more
articles.title: The Beastmaster of S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2, part one: How to make friends and eviscerate people

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
All that writing about gaming earbuds yesterday has reignited my appreciation for the HyperX Cloud Alpha Wireless, the PC headset I’ve been donning every day for... ooh, maybe two and a half years now? It sounds lovely, is comfortable enough to wear for hours, and has such a long battery life that we should probably just consider it witchcraft by now. Also, it’s just had its price cut for Black Friday week, dropping to a very agreeable £110 in the UK and $126.
 Read more
articles.title: The HyperX Cloud Alpha Wireless, my gaming headset of choice, is over £70 / $70 off for Black Friday

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
An on-going lawsuit against Valve about Steam's "anti-competitive" practices and especially, its infamous 30% per-game revenue cut, has taken an interesting twist. According to a report, it's now a class action suit that could benefit any developers or publishers who have sold a game over the Steam store on or after 28th January 2017.
 
Read more
articles.title: That lawsuit against Steam’s 30% cut of game sales is now a class action, meaning many other developers could benefit

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
Another explosion sends the bodies flying. "Has anyone been here long enough to tell me what the hell is going on!?" the sergeant yells. He sounds annoyed. The field hospital is gone, probably blown to pieces. Troops keep wandering north and disappearing from view, only to come flying back as airborne cadavers moments later. The number of corpses and spilled backpacks on the road imply that someone in battalion headquarters (if such a place even exists) has made a terrible decision. If the Colonial forces want to win the persistent online war of Foxhole, suggests the sergeant with his many irritated noises, then someone needs to piece these dying fools together. As the only medic in a 500 metre radius, that means me.
Read more
articles.title: I play Foxhole as a pacifist medic who refuses to carry a gun but the enemy doesn't seem impressed

articles.author: Ed Thorn
articles.description:
Palworld developers Pocketpair have revealed a new major update, which introduces "the largest and harshest" island in the survival game's history, together with new tower bosses and new pals. As for everything else… that's a secret, but you can expect a "large amount of new content", and we've got a few images to speculate over.
Read more
articles.title: Palworld's next major update brings an island "six times the size" of its last effort

articles.author: Joe O’Neill-Parker
articles.description:
The Alienware Black Friday sale is well underway, and you can get your hands on some very tasty gaming PCs for a huge discount this year. Our top pick from this sale is the Aurora R16 RTX 4090 Gaming PC for $2,999.99. That’s a gigantic $1,000 saving on a powerful out-of-the-box gaming PC.
 Read more
articles.title: Save $1,000 off this decked out Alienware Aurora R16 RTX 4090 gaming PC for Black Friday

articles.author: Joe O’Neill-Parker
articles.description:
We’re now just one day out from Black Friday, so the savings are starting to seriously ramp up. You can grab our favourite Steam Deck dock in the sale for just  $23.99 this year. That’s a full $16 off the usual price. The 6-in-1 option is also on sale and 20% off at Amazon today.
 Read more
articles.title: This JSAUX Steam Deck dock is down to just $24 for Black Friday

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
The genre of 'Action RPG' is supremely annoying to write about, because the term can mean different things to different people, but here’s how I see it: Diablo 4 and similar games, such as Path Of Exile, are 'ARPGs'. Which stands for 'Action RPG'. But Zelda games are 'Action RPGs', which is a totally different genre that you could, if you felt like it, also shorten to 'ARPG'. So, to summarise: ARPGs and ARPGs are two different things, and both are Action RPGs. Got it? Great.
It’s because of this kerfuffle that I’m not exactly mad at Diablo boss Rod Fergusson recently suggesting that we just call games that are similar to Diablo 'Diablo-likes'. I just find it very funny that he’s the one saying it, in a bold faced act of admittedly very inconsequential linguistic colonialism that carries the unspoken connotation that something is "like the game I make, but a bit crap".
Read more
articles.title: Man in charge of Diablo thinks we should start calling games that he thinks are like Diablo 'Diablo-likes'

articles.author: Ed Thorn
articles.description:
Back in January I wrote a (supporters only) post about how tired I am of all survival games starting off the same. Here's the gist of it: I've had enough of gathering rocks and sticks to make a crafting bench, from which I'm forced to build a hut and so on. I'm sure for some this is riveting, but for me, it's something I tire of within seconds.
And so it's with a heavy heart I say that Towers Of Aghasba suffers from the same starting gamut of sticks and stones. There's a hint of some interesting ecosystem stuff springing up a bit later, and judging by the trailers, an ability to clamber on massive flying creatures made of what looks like elephant skin and hair. Still, I just can't do it.
Read more
articles.title: I simply can't continue with Towers Of Aghasba's survival checklist, but I hope you can

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
I've gone on record as not being a huge fan of the artstyle choices used in the new Warcraft I & II remasters. It's crisp and readable, sure, but I'm never exactly thrilled to see all the roughness of older sprites completely done away with, especially when I always felt some of that ruggedness was the point. The tendency of remasters to treat every characterful oddity as a blemish is a wider topic than the scope of this article, but one day, Bluepoint will remaster Bloodborne, and the world will feel my pain. 
Anyway. Nowadays, I'd say Blizzard - or, World Of Warcraft, at least - is pretty much synomous with a softer, more colorful approach to fantasy worlds. While I don't pine for a return to the more boobily ridiculous elements of Frank Frazetta's style, I do often wish that some of the more expressive, pained, and physically grounded elements of classic Sword And Sorcery art was a bit more common. I'm no art scholar, and there's undoubtedly a bit of tunnel vision of my part to this assertion, but as far as as pop culture goes: I see the Blizzard version of fantasy more than I see the Frazetta version, and I don't exactly love it. Same goes for the older, punkier, less uniform sci-fi art from things like 2000 AD and Warhammer 40,000. Edwin touched on some of this in his excellent Space Marine piece. 
Anyway, a valued RPS community member on the Discord shared an older bit of art by Blizzard's Chris Metzen, from the original Starcraft manual. I figured a few of you might enjoy seeing these older pieces, considering how much the overall look of their games has changed over the years. 
Read more
articles.title: Blizzard's old manual art is a real nostalgia trip

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
The Cabin Factory is described as a horror game but it's sort of about deciding whether you are, in fact, playing a horror game. There is indeed a factory and it does indeed produce cabins - jolly, Center Parcs-style affairs made of big, merry logs, which roll up fully constructed on a conveyor belt. Your job is to enter and inspect them in first-person. What are you inspecting them for? Ghosts. 
 
Read more
articles.title: In assembly line horror The Cabin Factory, you search freshly-built holiday homes for ghosts

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Picking things up. Putting the things in boxes. Setting prices. Managing employees. Wiping the sweat from your creased brow and knowing, even if your meagre salary doesn’t get you very far, at least you put in an honest day’s graft to acquire it. All things done by pathetic fools that don’t realise the true CEO grindset actually involves no-wifing Diablo 4 all day and subsisting entirely off the the Lucozade-bottled urine of overworked drivers forced to make the agonising decision between self respect and continued employment. I might be conflating billionaires here.
Also, coincidentally, all things you can do in the demo for Beff Jezos Simulator. Now, work simulation games aren’t my absolute favourite. But, hey, I do love a good fantasy game. And what spellbinding vision of a farflung reality could be more fantastical than a game in which a billionaire actually does some work?
Read more
articles.title: Beff Jezos Simulator lets you indulge in the fantasy that billionaires actually do any work

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Way back in June, treacherous, fickle Larian declared that Baldur's Gate 3 patch 7 would be their final handover to players of the well-good D&D RPG, with the focus then shifting internally to Larian's two currently untitled new game projects. CEO Swen Vincke did, however, caveat that while the overall level of post-release support would be "diminished", there would be a few more updates. We interpreted that to mean bug fixes and the like. Certainly, I wasn't expecting brand new subclasses for every class in the game, which is what you'll get with the just-announced Baldur's Gate 3 patch 8, together with new crossplay functionality and a full-figured photo mode.
 Read more
articles.title: Baldur's Gate 3 is expanding yet again with 12 new subclasses, including drunk monks, teleporting beekeepers and shadow sorcerors

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Let's face it, nothing important happens in December. I'm scheduling 24 advent calendar posts this week and then spending the rest of the year eating boxes of Cadbury Mini Yule Logs Triple Chocolate. So it's no surprise that Devolver have announced their remaining slate of games aiming for release in 2024 are actually coming out in 2025.

The games that slipped are Baby Steps, Skate Story, and Stick It To The Stickman. Devolver released the news with typical style, via the 15th annual Devolver Delayed awards, which you can watch below.

 
Read more
articles.title: Devolver have delayed Baby Steps, Skate Story, Stick It To The Stickman into 2025

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Slipways was the best grand strategy game I'd played in years, because it tossed out all the genre's micromanagement in favour of a strategy puzzle where all your exploiting, expanding, et ceteraing could be squeezed into an hour's play. That game began as a PICO-8 prototype by designer Jakub Wasilewski before being polished to a fine shine in its full release.

All of which is just lead-in to talking about Solitomb, a solitaire-based dungeon crawler in which you fight demons by building hands of playing cards. It's currently - heywaitaminute - a pay-what-you-want PICO-8 prototype by designer Jakub Wasilewski where "all money earned goes towards making the bigger version possible." Like Slipways, it already seems like a frightfully clever piece of design.

 
Read more
articles.title: Solitomb is a demon-fighting prototype which mixes Balatro and solitaire, from the maker of Slipways

articles.author: Graham Smith
articles.description:
Announced last year, Exo Rally Championship does what the name suggests: takes the rugged, weather-battered terrain of Exo One's interplanetary journey and replaces the ponderous plot and gravitational rise-and-fall spaceship movement with a six-wheel, space buggy rally competition. Or put another way, if Exo One was Christopher Nolan's Tiny Wings, then this is Colin McRae's Interstellar.

Now there's a demo, and it's substantial with a tutorial, a 10 stage rally, and three "ever-changing Daily Stages with online Steam leaderboards."

 
Read more
articles.title: Exo Rally Championship's demo is out now, offering a 10-stage race across alien terrain

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
I have one urgent request for Starward Industries, creators of the just-announced “anti-combat” survival RPG Dante’s Ring – don’t use the phrase “ring of fire” in your English marketing materials. I get that you’re going for a cocktail of Divina Commedia and FromSoftware associations, but you have to remember that this is the internet and we're all desperately crude. I can’t speak for people from other English-language countries, but when I hear somebody talking about their "ring of fire", I tend to assume they’ve been at the vindaloo.
 Read more
articles.title: In Dante's Ring, you are a firefighter wrestling with your inner demons while sledding down a volcano

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
System requirements are on the rise, and a glut of recent PC facepunchers has left some of the RPS treehouse wondering if it’s time for a graphics card upgrade. Being a helpful colleague and a handsome friend, I dutifully informed them that the highly capable Nvidia GeForce RTX 4070 Super is currently getting the Black Friday price cut treatment, with Zotac’s Twin Edge model dropping especially low in both the UK and US. Still, dear readers, if you feel like punishing us for that comment system switch, you could always head over to Amazon and buy up all the stock yourself.
$590 is a decent deal for a model that’s spent most of the past few months at $610, but us Brits are getting the better bargain here - even if it’s not for the OC version. £500 means a hefty £49 slasheroo, the deepest discount this card has seen yet, and you’ll also get a key for Indiana Jones and the Great Circle to play when it releases on December 9th.
Read more
articles.title: The RTX 4070 Super is hitting new price lows for Black Friday, so snap them up before RPS staff do

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
It's often claimed by liars and fools that our website's title is a clever reference to the ancient Chinese game of shoushiling - or "rock paper scissors", as it's known overseas. The orthodox interpretation is that "Rock Paper Shotgun" is a folksy regional variation on this, with a "shotgun" instead of the "scissors". But friends, this is patently absurd. Think about it: a game that pits a shotgun against a rock or piece of paper would be incredibly one-sided. It goes against reason!
The sad reality is that the origins of our website's title have been deliberately obscured, allowing cold hard fact to slither back into legend. Behind that mockingly nonsensical moniker sleeps an eldritch truth of such gravity it would make Gandalf spill his mead. Friends, the Rock Paper Shotgun is real. The Weapon exists. Or at least, it once did - and will, for I mean to fashion it anew by combing the writing of RPS writers gone by for raw materials. And in this endeavour, I will naturally need your aid.
 
Read more
articles.title: The reforging of the Rock Paper Shotgun

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Earlier this week Humanoid Origin, a studio led by former Mass Effect director Casey Hudson, closed doors without a game to their name. Now, sadly, it's the turn of Worlds Untold, a studio founded by another former Mass Effect developer, Mac Walters. The studio have "paused operations" after apparently parting ways with publisher NetEase. While the announcement makes mention of continuing on with a new funding partner, laid-off staff are describing it as a studio closure.
 Read more
articles.title: Former Mass Effect writer's studio Worlds Untold are "pausing operations" in what staff call a studio closure

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
In hindsight, it’s surprising that it took so long for hardware manufacturers to start making "gaming" earbuds. If the likes of chairs, glasses, and chewing gum can be painted stealth-bomber black and prefixed with the G word, why not something that can actually get off its harshly angled bum and help pipe the games themselves into your head?
Then again, maybe gaming earbuds were just waiting for their moment. Obviously the Nintendo Switch is the Nintendo Switch, but the rise of handhelds like the Steam Deck and Asus ROG Ally has driven desires for more portable (yet games-friendly) noise-deliverers 'round these PC parts as well. Thus, for another edition of Should You Bother With – the RPS column where a diaphragm of testing vibrates advice directly into the cochlea of understanding – let’s have a listen of these wireless buds and find out whether they’re a worthy replacement for your current go-to headphones.
Read more
articles.title: Should you bother with... gaming earbuds?

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
Half-Life 2 just got a small update, mostly to fix a long-running music bug. But hiding in the patch notes is an apology of sorts, a nod to that most tenacious of bunnyhopper: the Half-Life 2 speedrunner. It seems the recent 20th anniversary update for the classic first-person shooter messed with some beginner speedrun strategies by introducing an invisible wall to a big sewer pipe. Valve have now corrected that, removing the offending blocker and restoring order to the universe. Well, almost.
Read more
articles.title: Valve added an invisible wall to this sewer pipe in Half-Life 2 in their anniversary update - but it only annoyed speedrunners

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
As anyone who’s ever glanced at some of the better entries at r/twosentencehorror will tell you, the genre thrives on restrictions. Here's a creepy good 'un: "'Please, God, don't let it look in the closet,’ I silently prayed. 'Please, God, don't let it look in the closet,' it parroted back from the next room." You can't do that with baby shoes, you anonymous hack!
Silent Hill 2 remake’s senior narrative designer Barbara Kciuk reckons this principle extends to much bigger productions. "It is a bit niche, but actually, the interesting part about horror is that it is one of the best ratios when it comes to the cost of production and the earnings," she recently told TheGamer’s Rhiannon Bevan.
Read more
articles.title: Silent Hill 2 remake's narrative designer thinks one of the advantages to horror is that it's cheaper

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
I just played the neon bathroom graffiti on magic mushrooms stylings of puzzle game Children Of The Sun for the first time last night, and it is very much my thing. It’s glowy! It’s violent! It’s thinky! You can be a bullet, and then you can be another bullet! Mental! (It’s technically the same bullet, but still!)
 Read more
articles.title: Stylish sniper puzzler Children Of The Sun just got a horde mode update and a hefty Steam discount

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Just when you thought you'd played all the RPGs - maxed every last stat, drained the XP of every last creature, tap-danced your way along every branching questline - CD Projekt have announced that The Witcher 4 is in "full-scale production".
 
Read more
articles.title: The Witcher 4 has entered "the most intensive phase of development", say CD Projekt

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
Whereas some bits of games kit are in and out of the sales like they keep forgetting their keys there, The PlayStation 5 DualSense controller is one of those peripherals that just seems to hover around its £60 / $75 list price indefinitely. Which is a shame, as it’s a very, very good gamepad, including for PC playage. Consider these Black Friday week deals, then, as a rare opportunity to secure yourself said good gamepad without acquiescing to Sony’s stubbornness: it’s down to £40 in the UK and $54 in the US.
Read more
articles.title: Ye gads, Black Friday week means the PS5 DualSense – a surprisingly great PC controller – is on sale for once

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
If you're playing a "PS1-style" game these days, odds are it's a horror game. Sometimes, I worry that the association of PS1 with moody, Silent Hillian dankness has gotten to the point that younger players no longer perceive the original PS1 as a video game console at all. Going by Itch.io's Halloween output, the PS1 was just a rusty bucket of rot and gore in which the faithful might periodically hallucinate the face of Spyro the Dragon.
Here to remind us that the PS1 was capable of colours beside "existential grey" is Water Level/b.l.u.e. EXPLORATION, from New York City-based game designer Hatim Benhsain. It's a free downloadable experiment inspired by b.l.u.e.: Legend of Water, a Japan-only PS1 adventure in which you are a girl swimming through alien ruins with her dolphin.
 Read more
articles.title: Madonna, Dark Souls and Mario meet in a sweet and confounding swimming experiment based on a PS1 obscurity

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
Recently, PC games have been gorging themselves silly on our storage space. 160GB for S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2? 190GB for God of War Ragnarok? If these games were people they’d stand waiting at the Pizza Hut buffet and nab ten of the twelve slices of Pepperoni Feast as soon as they’re slid under the heatlamps. What to do? For our part, there’s little we can do except upgrade capacity, and there are few better ways to do that on a budget than with the WD Blue SN580. It's a cheap yet fast PCIe 4.0 SSD, which the Black Friday sales have knocked down to £47 / $55 for 1TB.
 Read more
articles.title: Tell game-install-size inflation to sod off with the 1TB WD Blue SN850 SSD, now £47 / $55 for Black Friday

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
Here are some orc names I quite like. Haters will tell you these “aren’t real orcs”, but those fools are forever trapped in a stifling prison forged from the failures of their own imaginations. Suck it, haters:
Read more
articles.title: Omens Of Destruction brings hot gnoblar on gnoblar action to Total War: Warhammer 3

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Video games in general have a surplus of weapons. It's gotten to the point that if I had any freelance budget, I'd commission somebody to count them up. Just give me an approximate running total for the industry at large, so that whenever next a shiny-eyed producer regales me with the prospect of enchanted lazurite rapiers at a preview event, I can quietly ask how many enchanted lazurite rapiers we're talking about, then open my laptop and generate a scrolling image akin to those comparison pages for stars and planets - a cosmic mountain of points and pommels, with the new game's armoury forming a pixel-wide foothill in the bottom left corner. "Are there not enough enchanted lazurite rapiers," I will kindly enquire, as the producer sobs brokenly into my shoulder.
 Read more
articles.title: In Bladesong you are both the real hero and villain of any fantasy RPG - the person who makes all the swords

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Sometimes a home only becomes a home when you leave. I recently moved out from a London flat I'd rented for over a decade, for instance, and this has properly done a number on me. Being given my notice transformed the place from a transient pile of cadaverous lino and spasmodic plumbing into something mythical and unnerving – a whole chapter of my life completed and reduced to a piece of masonry in the rearview mirror, a relic I had been living in for years without quite realising.
A few video game developers have investigated emotions like these by recreating their current and prior homes as virtual environments: places of mingled memory and invention, expressive of both nostalgia and surprise. At this year's Game Developer Conference in San Francisco, I interviewed a couple of teams who are coming at this premise with very different objectives, and somehow, meeting in the middle. One of the games in question is a work of daydreaming fondness, the other of comical anger. Both find a focus in the figure of a matriarch who is kindly in one game, abusive in the other.

 
Read more
articles.title: What does it mean to recreate your old home in a video game?

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
When and where did the Steam demo for horror game New Life first find its way to me? When did its non-descript, black hooded protagonist first wriggle, with the transgressive delight of an unbidden slug between naked toes embarking on a 2am fridge odyssey, into the as yet uncolonised crevices of my ‘demos’ library? The specifics, I fear, are but the fumes of memories, lingering like armies of mice in trenchcoats at supermarket cheese sample platters, at once painfully obvious and immune to detection in their uncanny shroud of stifling human decorum. "For who is madder?!" I shout, in a normal and cool manner. "The mice - so very mad for cheese - or the madmen who screams ‘Mice! Mice!’ in the middle of the cheese aisle?!"
And if I can’t remember how it got here, how can I make it go away?
Read more
articles.title: I want to remove this horrible demo from my Steam library, but my body won’t let me

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
A studio led by former Mass Effect director Casey Hudson have shut down before being able to show the sci-fi narrative adventure they were working on. Humanoid Origin posted the announcement of the studio's closure on LinkedIn yesterday, saying that a "shortfall of funding" was responsible for the decision. They had been making a "multi-platform AAA game, focusing on character-driven narrative in an all-new science-fiction universe", according to the studio's website.
Read more
articles.title: Former Mass Effect director cancels his next sci-fi game as his studio closes before it is fully revealed

articles.author: Edwin Evans-Thirlwell
articles.description:
Many are the horror games that involve you going down. Down is where much of the Badness in the world is traditionally located, after all, whether you're talking about geology or psychology or theology. White Knuckle reverses the flow. You are already Down; by extrapolation, you must now go Up.
Possibly, you are Down because you are a manifestation of the aforementioned Badness. Possibly, the monstrous things trying to thwart your ascent are merely trying to stop you contaminating the surface world. Possibly, they are the Real Heroes. It doesn't really matter, because you don't have a choice. There is a wall of unspeakable flesh coming up the tunnel behind you. To avoid becoming part of it, you must climb.
 
Read more
articles.title: If Amnesia: The Dark Descent were actually Amnesia: The Dark Ascent, it would be White Knuckle

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
I’ve always liked the Razer Basilisk V3 Pro mouse, a lightweight wireless version of the equally comfortable and responsive Basilisk V3. Yet it’s usually been just a few tenners too expensive for me to say "You, RPS reader, buy this", and since telling people what to buy is around 40% of this job, well, that just leaves a peripheral-shaped hole in my heart.
 Read more
articles.title: One of my favourite wireless gaming mice is £60 / $60 off in the early Black Friday sales

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
"James, please don’t just make half your Black Friday deal posts about Steam Deck stuff again", warns a steely-eyed Graham. "I won’t", I reply in sing-song while quietly adding pictures of the JSAUX ModCase to the CMS. That’s right, Amazon and a bunch of other retails have launched their BF sales a week early, which is annoying, unless you’re in the market for a Steam Deck case upgrade. If so, consider the compact, multifunctional ModCase, which is down to just £24 / $24. That makes for savings of 33% and 20% respectively, on what was already a nicely affordable alternative to the luxury of Dbrand’s similar Project Killswitch.
Read more
articles.title: Let the Black Friday Steam Deck deals continue, with up to 33% off the clever JSAUX ModCase

articles.author: Brendan Caldwell
articles.description:
The enemies of survival shooter Stalker 2 have a funny habit of showing up right behind you, like a panto villain with an AK-47. Far from being a premeditated ambush by intelligent AI-controlled soldiers, this is just a result of the game's janky spawns. Those botched encounters are unlike previous games, where roaming bands of factional murderfolk would patrol the radioactive wastes, seemingly according to their own whims. Back in the day, this wandering baddies feature was dubbed "A-life" by developers GSC Game World - basically a jargon word for the simulation of enemies that would lead to "emergent" moments of violence and conflict. It was promised as a feature in Stalker 2 but many players have noticed it seems to be absent. Over the weekend, GSC insisted the simulation is technically present in the sequel. It's just broken.
Read more
articles.title: Stalker 2 devs insist complex AI simulation of enemy patrols is in the game - it's just broken

articles.author: Nic Reuben
articles.description:
If you’re a fan of Warhammer 40k, you know John Blanche. Even if it’s you’re first time hearing his name, you’ll be familiar with his fingerprints on some of the setting’s most defining artwork. He’s responsible for that iconic imagine of the emprah - the one the best shows off the dark irony of a such a wretched figure becoming an idol of worship. While the term ‘grimdark’ originates from 40k’s "in the grim darkness of the far future…" tagline, grimdark as an aesthetic is one Blanche pioneered. There’s even a style of miniature painting - Blanchitsu - named after him.
Basically, even games that don’t use the 40k license owe an incredible amount to Blanche’s work. That’s not to mention his influence on the fantasy setting of the Total War: Warhammer series either. His piece Harry The Hammer was the cover for the first edition of Fantasy Battle - recently added to the strategy game as chaos hero Harold Hammerstorm. I could go on, and I might do so in a bit, but here’s the news: Trademark Films are making a documentary on Blanche’s work, starring Napoleon Dynamite actor Jon Heder. It’s called The Grim And The Dark: The Search For John Blanche, and it’s out next Spring. Here’s a trailer:
Read more
articles.title: Napoleon Dynamite is making a documentary about the artist that inspired your favourite Warhammer games

articles.author: James Archer
articles.description:
Microsoft have "applied a compatibility hold" to – i.e., blocked the installation of – a new Windows 11 update that’s causing havoc with certain Ubisoft games. Star Wars Outlaws, Assassin's Creed Valhalla, and Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora are among the weirdly publisher-specific victims of Windows 11 version 24H2, which by Microsoft’s admission (well spotted, Bleeping Computer) is causing crashes and crap performance in the affected games. Even after, in Outlaws’ case, Ubisoft responded to the complaints with their own patch.
Read more
articles.title: Microsoft have blocked their own Windows 11 update after it started breaking Ubisoft games

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Dnes se budeme zabývat těmi novými instrukcemi, které byly přidány do třetí generace mikroprocesorů rodiny 80×86, tj. konkrétně do čipů Intel 80386 (a posléze i Intel 80486). Prozatím se zaměříme především na reálný režim.
articles.title: Vývoj mikroprocesorů z rodiny 80×86: 32bitové čipy 80386 a 80486

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Bařina)
articles.description: Podíváme se na kompresi dat pomocích slovníkových metod. Ty využívají ke kódování částí vstupního toku dat – slovník. Slovník může být jednoduchý buffer několika předchozích symbolů nebo sofistikovaná datová struktura.
articles.title: Algoritmy pro kompresi dat: slovníkové metody

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Po dvou letech se na OPF SLU v Karviné konal další ročník konference Ověřená řešení v sítích. Mluvilo se o ochraně dat před kybernetickými útoky, moderním vývoji bankovních systémů a důležitosti správy logů.
articles.title: Útok přijde, připravte se, na porady pak nebude čas, zaznělo na ORS 2024

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: Sonda do světa otevřeného softwaru. Dnes se naučíme japonské znaky, podíváme se na využití systémových prostředků, vyzkoušíme elegantní videopřehrávač a připneme si užitečné informace na plochu.
articles.title: Softwarová sklizeň (4. 12. 2024): naučte se konečně japonsky

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Bařina)
articles.description: GMP (GNU MP nebo též libgmp) je matematická knihovna pro práci v libovolné přesnosti. Podíváme se na racionální čísla a čísla s plovoucí desetinnou čárkou. Ukážeme si jejich přiřazování a základní aritmetické operace.
articles.title: Knihovna GMP: racionální čísla a čísla s plovoucí desetinnou čárkou

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Tišnovský)
articles.description: Většina příkladů, které jsme si až doposud ukazovali, využívala pouze instrukce a registry dostupné na původních mikroprocesorech 8086 a 8088. Ovšem možnosti instrukčních sad se postupně s příchodem dalších čipů řady x86 rozšiřovaly.
articles.title: Vývoj mikroprocesorů z rodiny 80×86: od Intelu 8086 k čipu 80286

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Kopřiva)
articles.description: V dnešním díle pravidelných pondělních Postřehů se podíváme na nedávný vývoj okolo nového zákona o kybernetické bezpečnosti, první UEFI bootkit pro Linux nebo obcházení antivirů s pomocí herního enginu.
articles.title: Postřehy z bezpečnosti: zákon o kybernetické bezpečnosti o krok blíže schválení

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Filip Zatloukal)
articles.description: SUSE pokračuje ve změně značky a přejmenovává produkty. The Bread Code je obsáhlý open-source návod na kváskový chleba. Nedávno vydaný elementary OS 8, postavený na Ubuntu 24.04 LTS a poháněný jádrem 6.8, přináší řadu vylepšení.
articles.title: SUSE přejmenovává produkty, kváskový chleba pod svobodnou licencí

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Týden v KDE a vypínatelná pravidla KWin, LibreOffice 25.2 na přelomu ledna/února, vyšla první alfa, nová verze Tails 6.10 přinášející aktuální prohlížeč i poštovního klienta s vypnutou telemetrií.
articles.title: BIOS tuning pro nové AMD EPYC a AI, jádro 6.13 odstraňuje neudržované ovladače

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Šéfka projektu elementary OS, Danielle Foréová, informuje o vydání již osmé verze této linuxové distribuce snažící se co nejvíce přiblížit uživatelskému zážitku z Apple macOS. Novinek není zrovna málo.
articles.title: Distribuce elementary OS 8 aneb Linux oblečený v kabátku macOS

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Po půl roce od předchozího vydání byla uvolněna nová pravidelná verze linuxové distribuce Alpine Linux, tentokrát s označením 3.21.0. Hlavní novinkou je přidání podpory pro architekturu LoongArch64, což je procesorová architektura kompatibilní s MIPS vyvíjená společností Loongson, jejíž vývojářský tým se na podpoře v Alpine podílel.
articles.title: Alpine Linux 3.21.0 přidává podporu architektury LoongArch64

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Arnd Bergmann včera navrhl do jádra podporu pro úrovně architektury x86–64 v1 – v4. V současnosti je možné v jádře vybrat AMD K8, Intel P4, Intel Core 2, Intel Atom a obecný x86–64.
articles.title: Linus Torvalds je proti zavedení úrovní architektury x86-64 v1–v4 do jádra

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Windows 11 již od začátku požaduje TPM 2.0. Nicméně tento požadavek jde již nějakou dobu obejít pomocí vytvoření klíčů BypassTPMCheck=0x1, BypassRAMCheck=0x1 a BypassSecureBootCheck=0x1 v registru HKLM\SYSTEM\Setup\LabConfig. V úterý však Steven Hosking na blogu napsal, že podmínku TPM 2.0 pro Windows 11 již obejít nepůjde.
articles.title: Podmínku TPM 2.0 pro Windows 11 nepůjde obejít

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Jak jsme informovali před dvěma měsíci, Mapy.cz chystaly prémiovou verzi. Ta je od úterý postupně spouštěna v mobilních aplikacích. Premium stojí 249 korun za rok a umožní mít offline mapy více států a větší možnosti personalizace. Jde například o nastavení rychlosti chůze nebo jízdy na kole.
articles.title: Placené Mapy.cz stojí 249 korun za rok

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Jan Fikar)
articles.description: Dnes ráno kurz bitcoinu poprvé překonal 100 tisíc dolarů. Dosáhl maxima 103,4 tisíce dolarů a v současnosti se prodává za 102,7 tisíce dolarů.
articles.title: Kurz bitcoinu překonal 100 tisíc dolarů

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Debian vybíral ze šesti návrhů grafického vzhledu pro připravovanou třináctou verzi s názvem Trixie. Jako výchozí grafické téma bylo nakonec vybráno téma „Ceratopsian“ od Elise Couperové. Trixie je fiktivní postavička z Příběhu hraček a vzhled Ceratopsian je inspirován jejími tvary.
articles.title: Ceratopsian bude výchozím vzhledem pro Debian 13 Trixie

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Poslední léta běžící vývoj protokolu a podpory pro správu barev aplikací běžících na Waylandu se, zdá se, blíží do finále. Pekka Paalanen nyní schvaluje implementaci pro referenční kompozitor Weston a otázkou je pouze svižnost implementace v rámci „obvyklých“ kompozitorů, tedy GNOME Mutter a KDE KWin – u prvně jmenovaného víme o blížící se podpoře v rámci GNOME 47 u druhého se už také měsíce řeší implementace.
articles.title: Wayland protokol pro správu barev míří do finále

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Vedle všemožných ovladačů, které už s podporou prvního modelu generace Battlemage, tedy karty Arc B580, počítají, vydává nyní Intel i novou verzi výpočetního balíku Compute Runtime 24.45.31740.9 a víceméně tak dovršuje přípravy na uvedení B580 na trh, které proběhne za zhruba jeden týden.
articles.title: Intel Compute Runtime 24.45.31740.9 připraven na vydání karet Arc B580 Battlemage

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Vilém Sládek)
articles.description: Vývojářský tým projektu Datovka oznámil vydání nové verze této mobilní aplikace pro přístup k datovým schránkám. Novinkou Mobilní Datovky verze 2.2.0 je například možnost přiřadit k jednotlivým schránkám vlastní obrázky, což by mělo vést k lepší identifikaci v seznamu schránek. Vývojáři také přidali editor interních nastavení, který může posloužit při ladění nebo hledání problémů v aplikaci.
articles.title: Datovka od CZ.NIC umožňuje přiřazování vlastních obrázků ke schránkám

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Tony)
articles.description: Zajímá vás jak pracuje vývojář linuxového jádra? Možná jste slyšeli o termínech jako upstream, downstream, ale co opravdu znamenají? Jak se vůbec pracuje na upsteamovém kernelu?
articles.title: Přednáška o vývoji linuxového jádra

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Jeremy Cline (pracuje v Microsoftu na linuxových věcech, předtím působil v Red Hatu v rámci vývoje Fedory i jádra) navrhuje zlepšit podporu Fedory při běhu v rámci Windows Subsystem For Linux 2 (WSL2) na platformě Microsoft Windows. V jeho rámci lze distribuovat vlastní obrazy jako tarball, Appx či skrze Windows Store, nicméně dříve byl problém s příliš restriktivní licencí Microsoftu (nutnost souhlasit s podmínkami obchodu a „podepsat“ vývojářský souhlas). To v současných verzích WSL2 už neplatí, Jeremy konstatuje, že s WSL 2.4.4 a vyššími je usnadněna distribuce vlastních obrazů mimo obchod Microsoftu.
articles.title: Fedora 42 možná s vlastními obrazy pro Windows Subsystem For Linux

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Zajímá vás moderní přístup ke službám a témata jako Docker, kontejnery, cloud, virtualizace a Kubernetes? Připravili jsme pro vás čtyřdenní kurz Docker s Kubernetes, na který můžete získat dotaci až 82 % od Úřadu práce. Kontaktujte naši kolegyni pavla.hettnerova@iinfo.cz. K dotaci se musíte přihlásit do 19. prosince.
articles.title: Čtyřdenní kurz Docker s Kubernetes dotovaný Úřadem práce

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Národní filmový archiv oznámil spuštění nového kanálu na YouTube s názvem Filmová klasika, který postupně zpřístupní vybrané české filmy. Nabídne přitom především tituly, které lidé v běžné nabídce televizí nebo VOD platforem nenajdou. Aktuálně čítá 13 filmů, namátkou od Formanova Konkursu či Klapzubovy jedenáctky, přes Kachyňův Pozor, vizita! až třeba po Vorlův Kouř.
articles.title: Filmová klasika od Národního filmového archivu odteď na YouTube

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Sdružení CESNET úspěšně ověřilo funkčnost laditelných koherentních transceiverů Cisco QSFP-DD Bright 400G ZR+ pro vysokorychlostní přenosy dat. Testy prokázaly možnost propojení dvou přepínačů rychlostí 400 Gb/s, na trase o délce až 846 kilometrů, bez použití transpondéru a s nulovou chybovostí. To představuje úsporu provozních nákladů a umožní lépe reagovat na rostoucí požadavky na objem dat a flexibilní propojování datových center.
articles.title: CESNET otestoval přenos 400 Gb/s na 846 kilometrů pomocí QSFP-DD transceiverů

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Poslední generace minipočítačů Raspberry Pi je další třídou zařízení, na kterých je možné provozovat službu Steam Link, tedy vzdálené hraní her běžících na jiném počítači (typicky výkonném desktopu) skrze právě Raspberry Pi. Raspberry dodává, že Valve se zde v přípravě podpory též zapotilo, a to kvůli grafické kvalitě přenášené scény a také typicky nepřenášenému zvuku, plus samozřejmě očekávané nutnosti srazit latence přenosů na minimum.
articles.title: Valve Steam Link funguje s Raspberry Pi 3 až 5

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: David Ježek)
articles.description: Po procesorech rodiny Arrow Lake nesoucích integrované grafické jádro Xe2 přichází na svět i velké grafické karty vybavené touto generací. Dlouho očekávané grafiky generace Intel Battlemage byly ohlášeny, na trh zamíří 13. prosince vyšší model Arc B580 a v polovině ledna nižší model Arc B570.
articles.title: Intel představil Arc B580 a B570, grafické karty Battlemage s GPU Xe2

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Společnost Intel v pondělí oznámila, že odstoupil její generální ředitel Pat Gelsinger. Finanční ředitel společnosti David Zinsner a šéfka Client Computing Group Michelle Johnston Holthausová se budou dělit o funkci dočasného generálního ředitele, zatímco správní rada společnosti bude hledat nového generálního ředitele. Gelsinger rovněž odstoupil ze svého místa v představenstvu.
articles.title: Pat Gelsinger odstoupil z funkce ředitele Intelu po velmi neúspěšném období

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Každé nové vydání Fedory znamená konec podpory pro verzi, která byla uvolněna před rokem. Po nedávném uvedení Fedory 41 tedy nastal čas se rozloučit s verzí 39, která přestala dostávat aktualizace k 26. listopadu.
articles.title: Fedora 39 už nemá podporu, je čas přejít na novější verzi

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: bkralik)
articles.description: Zajímáte se o techniku, ale nemáte ve svém okolí s kým si o ní pokecat? Pak dorazte 3. prosince na strahováckou Virtuální Bastlírnu, kde si můžete neformálně online popovídat s ostatními makery, hackery, hardwaráři, softwaráři, ale třeba i vědci a vysokoškolskými učiteli. Samozřejmě pro případy, kdyby řeč stála, mají bastlíři nachystaná i aktuální témata k nastartování diskuze. Jaká to jsou pro prosinec?
articles.title: Virtuální Bastlírna vol. 45: jak se pracuje s novým FreeCADem?

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pavel Štrobl)
articles.description: Síťování je složité téma o kterém se dá povídat celé hodiny a pořád nebudete mít dost. Ale co teprve síťování v Kubernetes? To je teprve něco a taktéž je to téma dalšího Cloud Native Prague meetupu, který se bude tématicky konat v kancelářích Cisco na Pankráci.
articles.title: Cloud Native Prague #19: o síťování v Kubernetes

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Pitva)
articles.description: Advent of Code je adventní kalendář logických programátorských hádanek, který probíhá každý rok od 1. do 25. prosince. Pro řešitele jsou každý den připraveny dvě úlohy, které kombinují kreativní myšlení a kódování. Hádanky jsou provázány tématickým příběhem a účastníci získávají za jejich vyřešení hvězdy, které příběhovou linku rozvíjejí a posouvají kupředu.
articles.title: Advent of Code 2024: adventní kalendář pro programátory

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Portál Identity občana (původně Národní identitní autorita, NIA) se během víkendu přestěhoval na novou doménu pod gov.cz. Digitální a informační agentura (DIA) tento krok urychlila v reakci na rostoucí počet falešných webových stránek. Na doméně gov.cz již také operují Portál občana a Portál veřejné správy. DIA nadále doporučuje, aby uživatelé kontrolovali odkazy či adresy, přes které na portály vstupují. Jediné správné adresy jsou: identita.gov.cz, obcan.portal.gov.cz a portal.gov.cz.
articles.title: Identita občana se přesunula na doménu gov.cz, bojuje tím proti podvodným webům

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Redakce)
articles.description: Automatizace pomocí continuous integration přímo v Gitlabu. CI vám pomůže automatizovat rutinní procesy a ušetří vám hromadu času. Pomůže vám od automatického testování, buildy po nasazování. Chcete vědět víc? Přijďte na naše školení GitLab CI, které se uskuteční 17. prosince a proběhne online. Školí Ondřej Sika, zkušený vývojář, konzultant DevOps a lektor.
articles.title: Gitlab CI: automatizujte přímo v Gitlabu (školení)

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Vývojáři uvolnili Xfce 4.20 Pre2, což by měla být poslední testovací verze před ostrým vydáním. Byly opraveny některé dříve objevené chyby a probíhá poslední ladění. Vydání Xfce 4.20 je v tuto chvíli naplánováno na 15. prosince. Proběhl také výběr pozadí plochy, přišlo celkem 54 návrhů od 18 uživatelů.
articles.title: Xfce 4.20 vyjde za dva týdny, ladí se poslední detaily

articles.author: redakce@root.cz (Root.cz: Petr Krčmář)
articles.description: Směrovač OpenWrt One, který byl představen začátkem října, je nyní běžně dostupný. Jedná se o otevřený hardware vyvinutý v rámci projektu OpenWrt ve spolupráci s výrobcem Banana Pi. Deska je založená na SoC MediaTek MT7981B (Filogic 820) a dvoupásmové čipové sadě MediaTek MT7976C WiFi 6.
articles.title: OpenWrt One se začal prodávat za 89 dolarů

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Bez člověka u počítače kvalitní AI nevybudujete, říká regionální šéf Dell Technologies. Agenti AI a lidé budou společně pracovat na úspěchu u zákazníků. GFI Software: Firmy chybně identifikují svá kritická IT aktiva. Nový Red Hat Device Edge snižuje latenci a zefektivňuje úlohy AI na okraji sítě. Portworx umožní zrychlení úloh v systému Kubernetes. Fortinet posiluje umělou inteligenci u ochrany dat a řízení vnitřních rizik.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Firmy chybně identifikují svá kritická IT aktiva

articles.author: Reklama
articles.description: Jsme u výprodeje na Black Friday. Ceny u Goodoffer24 jsou opravdu skvělé, když se podíváte na standardní koupi jejich doživotních licencí. Během výprodeje na Black Friday je cena výrazně snížena jak pro Windows, tak pro Office, zejména u klíče na  Windows 11, což je dnes nejoblíbenější produkt.
articles.title: Jen jednou za rok můžete na Black Friday získat u Goodoffer24 doživotní licenci na Windows 11 za €20 a Office za €24!

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 48/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Exotická fyzika neutronových hvězd. Scénář temného velkého třesku. Astronomové pořídili první detailní snímek hvězdy mimo naši Galaxii.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Čipové války

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Nová generace all-flash úložišť OceanStor Dorado pro éru AI. HPE představuje jednotnou správu virtualizace, nové rychlé objektové úložiště a izolované privátní cloudy. Dell Technologies urychluje AI inovace a posiluje kybernetickou bezpečnost. Vedení pod mořem jsou důležitá infrastruktura, Západ se bojí jejího narušení. Vědci zkoumali, jak umělá inteligence dokáže v textu rozpoznávat lidské emoce. Huawei: Společně pro ekologičtější a inteligentnější budoucnost v Evropě. Nový Red Hat OpenShift AI zvyšuje škálovatelnost a přizpůsobivost umělé inteligence.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Vedení pod mořem jsou důležitá infrastruktura, Západ se bojí jejího narušení

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 47/2024

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Podivná neutronová hvězda vyvolává nejistotu. Dvě vrstvy atomů dostali do blízkosti 50 nanometrů. Práškový diamant by mohl v magnetické rezonanci nahradit gadolinium. Syntéza kvalitního grafenu vyžaduje prostředí bez stop kyslíku.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Vědci dokázali vyladit Casimirovu sílu pomocí magnetického pole

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Pomocí DNA vyrobili diamantové fotonické krystaly. Obětí phishing útoků se v posledním roce stalo až 80 % organizací kritické infrastruktury. AWS Cloud Day Prague 2024. Synology Experience Day 2024. Pure Storage zjednodušuje migraci podnikových prostředí VMware do cloudu Microsoft Azure. Chris Keller z AWS přiblížil na Cloud Day Prague novinky.
articles.title: Týden na ITBiz: Obětí phishing útoků se v posledním roce stalo až 80 % organizací kritické infrastruktury

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Chemie ultratěžkých prvků moscovia (115) a nihonia (113) má souviset s relativistickými efekty. Navrhují vznik temné energie v černých dírách. Kvantové provázání přežije i chemickou reakci. Ničení nebezpečných objektů jejich stáhnutím do atmosféry. Temná hmota by mohla hvězdám zajistit nesmrtelnost.
articles.title: Týden na ScienceMag.cz: Magický grafen může být supravodivý jen do 60 K

articles.author: Redakce
articles.description: Ucelený přehled článků, zpráviček a diskusí za minulých 7 dní.
articles.title: Událo se v týdnu 46/2024

articles.author: Reklama
articles.description: Máme zde výprodej na Black Friday a ceny od Dckeyoffer jsou opravdu skvělé když sháníte originální doživotní licence na Windows. Během výprodeje na Black Friday máme vysoké slevy na platné licence na Windows a Office. Zejména klíč na Windows 11 je dnes nejžádanější, tak na co čekat?
articles.title: Při výprodeji Black Friday je doživotní licence Windows 11 jen za €20, za Office €24

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Byla vydána nová stabilní verze 3.21.0, tj. první z nové řady 3.21, minimalistické linuxové distribuce zaměřené na bezpečnost Alpine Linux (Wikipedie) postavené na standardní knihovně jazyka C musl libc a BusyBoxu. Z novinek lze vypíchnou počáteční podporu architektury Loongson LoongArch64.
articles.title: Alpine Linux 3.21.0

articles.author: JZD
articles.description: Hodnota Bitcoinu, decentralizované kryptoměny překonala 100 000 dolarů (2 390 000 korun).
articles.title: Bitcoin překonal magický milník 100 000 dolarů

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Mapy.cz Premium stojí 249 korun ročně. Premium verze je zaváděna postupně.
articles.title: Mapy.cz Premium stojí 249 korun ročně

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Hurl byl vydán ve verzi 6.0.0. Hurl je nástroj běžící v příkazovém řádku, který spouští HTTP požadavky definované v textovém souboru.
articles.title: Hurl 6.0.0

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Výsledek hlasování: Výchozím grafickým motivem Debianu 13 aneb Trixie bude Ceratopsian.
articles.title: Výchozím grafickým motivem Debianu 13 aneb Trixie bude Ceratopsian

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Rodina jednodeskových počítačů Orange Pi se rozrostla (𝕏) o Orange Pi 5 Ultra.
articles.title: Orange Pi 5 Ultra

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Mobilní Datovka, tj. svobodná aplikace pro přístup k datovým schránkám pro zařízení s operačním systémem iOS a Android, byla vydána v nové verzi 2.2.0. Nově lze nastavit vlastní obrázky pro jednotlivé datové schránky pro jejich lepší identifikaci v seznamu schránek. Přidán byl editor vnitřních nastavení aplikace, který slouží jako přehled všech hodnot, které aplikace udržuje.
articles.title: Mobilní Datovka 2.2.0

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Společnost DuckDuckGo stojící za stejnojmenným vyhledávačem letos věnovala 1,1 milionu dolarů na podporu digitálních práv, online soukromí a lepšího internetového ekosystému. Peníze byly rozděleny mezi Electronic Frontier Foundation (EFF), Public Knowledge, ARTICLE 19, Demand Progress, European Digital Rights (EDRi), Fight for the Future, The Markup, OpenMedia, Restore the Fourth, Signal, Surveillance Technology Oversight Project (S.T.O.P.), Tech Policy Press, Tech Oversight Project, Algorithmic Justice League (AJL), Bits of Freedom, British Institute of International and Comparative Law (BIICL), Center for Critical Internet Inquiry (C2i2), Creative Commons (CC), Digital Rights Watch, Gesellschaft für Freiheitsrechte (GFF), noyb, Open Home Foundation, Open Rights Group (ORG), Open Source Technology Improvement Fund (OSTIF), Perl and Raku Foundation, Privacy Rights Clearinghouse, Proof a Tor Projec.
articles.title: Společnost DuckDuckGo věnovala 1,1 milionu dolarů na podporu digitálních práv, online soukromí a lepšího internetového ekosystému

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: LibrePCB, tj. svobodný multiplatformní softwarový nástroj pro návrh desek plošných spojů (PCB), byl vydán ve verzi 1.2.0. Přehled novinek v příspěvku na blogu a v aktualizované dokumentaci. Vypíchnut je import knihoven KiCadu. Zdrojové kódy LibrePCB jsou k dispozici na GitHubu pod licencí GPLv3.
articles.title: LibrePCB 1.2.0

articles.author: Ladislav Hagara
articles.description: Při mezinárodní operaci byla zablokována pokročilá služba pro šifrovanou komunikaci MATRIX, oznámil úřad pro evropskou justiční spolupráci Eurojust. K uzavření služby podle něj vedlo vyšetřování společného týmu, na němž se podílely francouzské a nizozemské úřady a který byl zřízen při Eurojustu. Službu podle něj využívaly kriminální živly. Tato služba MATRIX nemá nic společného s nadací Matrix a protokolem Matrix.
articles.title: MATRIX nemá nic společného s nadací Matrix a protokolem Matrix

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: System76 today released the newest development/testing version of their Rust-based desktop environment designed for their Pop!_OS Linux distribution...
articles.title: COSMIC Alpha 4 Released For System76's Rust-Based Desktop

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: For the past month and a half the NVIDIA R565 Linux driver series has been in public beta with a number of (X)Wayland improvements, DMA-BUF enhancements, VKD3D fixes, and a variety of other enhancements. Today the NVIDIA 565.77 Linux driver was released as the first stable build in the series...
articles.title: NVIDIA 565.77 Linux Driver Released As First Stable R565 Build

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: Alpine Linux 3.21 is out today as the newest version of this simple, lightweight, and security-minded Linux distribution that is popular for use within containerized environments, embedded systems, and more...
articles.title: Alpine Linux 3.21 Released With Linux 6.12 & GCC 14, LoongArch CPU Support

articles.author: Michael Larabel
articles.description: With the new Linux kernel patches posted yesterday for cleaning up x86 32-bit kernels on x86_64 CPUs as part of that patch series was introducing new Kconfig build options around the x86_64 micro-architecture feature levels. It turns out though that Torvalds is completely against how the x86_64 feature levels are handled by the compiler toolchain folks and doesn't want to see it invading the kernel...
articles.title: Linus Torvalds Comes Out Against "Completely Broken" x86_64 Feature Levels

articles.author: Michael Larabel

articles.author: Filip Galekovic
articles.description:
While I'm not about to propose the tank-like CRT screens of yesteryear are better than modern-day OLED displays, I do think there's merit in how phosphors, specifically, render pixels. That's why I was thrilled to discover someone's created a set of CRT-style overlays for the Steam Deck.


While CRT shaders have existed in some form or another for a while now as part of the ever-popular ReShade injector, getting them to render correctly is a wholly different can of worms. Some of them are also quite the performance hogs, and it's no surprise that they don't work great on low-resolution displays. The Steam Deck's humble 1200x800 screen hasn't worked well with the ones I tried. Now, however, Reddit user Traditional-Ad1708 has taken it upon themselves to fine-tune a number of CRT-style shader…
articles.title: There’s a fancy CRT-style overlay bundle available for your Steam Deck

articles.author: Kristina Ebanez
articles.description:
Every so often, I get the urge to play puzzle games just to see if I am as smart as I (sometimes) think I am. I don't usually pour too many hours into them since my brain can only handle so much. Yet, my experience with Dungeons of Dreadrock 2: The Dead King's Secret was the complete opposite, as I constantly lost track of time with its many puzzles. I even had to force myself to put it down, with the thought of "just one more puzzle" lingering in my mind. 


DoD2 continues off from the original narrative, featuring the same retro-inspired art style. I'm new to the series, but understanding its storyline wasn't too much of a stretch. It's your classic adventure where the hero, aka the sorceress, ventures into a treacherous place to find the Crown of Wisdom. 


Screenshot by Destructoid


D…
articles.title: Review: Dungeons of Dreadrock 2 – The Dead King’s Secret

articles.author: Chris Penwell
articles.description:
The Disney Dreamlight Valley Arcane Garlic Crab recipe helps you create a four-star dish to wow your pals like Remy and Elsa. Thankfully, most of the ingredients are easy to find.


All Arcane Garlic Crab Disney Dreamlight Valley ingredients


Arcane Garlic Crab is made with four different ingredients. Two of them require The Storybook Vale DLC. 



Sorcerer Hat Hermit Crab


Salt Crystal


Garlic


Any Spice




Screenshot by Destructoid


Screenshot by Destructoid



You'll find the Sorcerer Hat Hermit Crab by fishing at The Bind. Head to the water and try to find a golden ripple within the waves. Get your fishing rod and catch this Sorcerer Hat Hermit Crab from within it. There's a possibility of getting an extra Sorcerer Hat Hermit Crab if you hang out with a buddy who has a fishing specialty. 


Salt Crystals are found within the waters of Everafter. Fish in a spot other than a ripple to gain Salt Crystals for the recipe. 


Garlic is an easy ingredient to find in Disney Dreamlight Valley. Head to the Forest of Valor, and you'll see the crop growing within the grass. You can pick up the cooking ingredient from the soil. It has green leaves flowing from the ground. 


Lastly, you can pick any spice for the Arcane Garlic Crab. One of Storybook Vale's spices is Black Pepper, which can be bought from Goofy's Stall in The Elysian Fields from Mythopia. You can buy its seeds from Goofy for 70 Star Coins. It takes an hour and a half to grow.


After getting all of the ingredients, go to a cooking station in your house or Chez Remy. Once made, you can sell the Arcane Garlic Crab for 1,429 Star Coins or eat it for 3,265 Energy. 

The post How to make Arcane Garlic Crab in Disney Dreamlight Valley appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to make Arcane Garlic Crab in Disney Dreamlight Valley

Trying to figure out which units to roll for in Ball Tower Defense’s various banners can be confusing. Then, I’ll rank units from S to E-Tier where the top two Tiers S and A are must-haves in your loadout. B-Tier are all-around great options that just lack the raw power of higher Tiers. articles.author: Darrus Myles
articles.description:
In Towers of Aghasba, Feathers are an Uncommon material used for several differing crafting recipes. Since it is Uncommon, it isn't the easiest resource to find, but if you know where to look, they aren't difficult to obtain.


Where to get Feathers in Towers of Aghasba


Obtaining Feathers in any reasonable amount will require you to sacrifice precious Amity, because the most common source of them is by hunting animals. While I have not found every single creature roaming the wilds of Aghasba, I have found a number that has a chance to drop Feathers when hunted and killed. 


Your first instinct to find Feathers may be to look for birds flying in the sky, but the easiest way to obtain them actually comes from a slow-roaming creature on land. The chubby Fuzzyfin has a decently high chance of dropping Feathers, and they are very easy to hunt due to how slow they are. They also don't have a large health pool, able to be slain with two Flint Arrows, the weakest type. 


Screenshot by Destructoid


Fuzzyfins are by far the easiest way to obtain Feathers en mass because they are a common animal found in Tropical Ecosystems, which you will have access to just by following the Towers of Aghasba's main story quest. They roam this Ecosystem at all times of the day and are naturally curious creatures meaning they will not flee from you once approached. Also, if you really want to get efficient with hunting them down, use Lectuce to lure them into groups for easy pickings. Just don't kill too many of them, or you will suffer significant Amity loss, something you want to avoid.

The post How to get Feathers in Towers of Aghasba appeared first on Destructoid.
articles.title: How to get Feathers in Towers of Aghasba

Denuvo anti-piracy tech has often been a sore point for gamers, especially on PC. However, many of you will be pleased to know that MachineGames' Indiana Jones and the Great Circle will not be shipping with the offending DRM software when it launches on December 9.


This was confirmed by publisher Bethesda in a post on X recently. The message seems to be a reply to a now-deleted comment from a user, prompting the studio to say that The Great Circle "does not include Denuvo." This was then followed by a statement declaring that it was only ever used in "review builds for leak precautions."




Indeed, if you look on the game's official Steam page, you can see down the right-hand side that a third-party EULA needs to be agreed to before playing the game, but there's no mention of DRM in use…

Critical Role has said that it is in “active pursuit” of a video game deal, potentially expanding the team’s reach even further. 


The team of voice actors, headed by Matt Mercer, has become a powerhouse in the geek publishing world with its own D&D campaign streaming series, its own campaign settings, novels, an Amazon Prime animated series, its own tabletop game, and more.


From humble beginnings


Critical Role started as part of the Geek & Sundry channel and essentially streamed a group of voice-actor friends playing D&D campaigns. In 2019, Critical Role decided to move away from Geek & Sundry. The split led to the decline of Geek & Sundry but also saw Critical Role go from strength to strength with the creative freedom it desired.


In September 2024, Geek & Sundry partnered with Re…

While Infinity Nikki is filled with exploration, adventures, and quests to complete, it is at its heart a dress-up game inspired by previous titles in the Nikki series. articles.author: Arka Sarkar
articles.description:
EA Sports has officially confirmed the Ultimate Succession promo, which is coming up next in EA FC 25 Ultimate Team.


There have been plenty of fresh campaigns in Ultimate Team this year, and the Ultimate Succession promo will add to that list. You'll be able to find the cards in packs starting Friday, but EA Sports hasn't revealed which items will be available on the promo. However, a few leaks have already begun making their rounds on social media.


All EA FC 25 Ultimate Succession promo players


So far, there have been a few leaks about which footballers are going to be featured in the Ultimate Succession promo. It's safe to say that all of them are pretty well-known in the world of football, and Barcelona fans will certainly love the items.



Lamine Yamal


Lionel Messi


Marcus Thuram


Steven Gerrard (Icon)


James Milner


Manuel Akanji


Gregor Kobel


Nico Schlotterbeck


Joshua Kimmich


Joao Palhinha


Le Sommer 


Selma Bacha


Roman Burki


Marquinhos


Jorginho


Sandro Tonali



However, plenty of names are expected to be revealed as leaks over the next couple of days. EA Sports could also hint at a few cards that will be made available in the promo. If the rumors are to be believed, the upcoming campaign will have Heroes and Icons as well. If that turns out to be true, Ultimate Succession will become the first promo this year to feature all three cards - active footballers, Heroes, and Icons.


As always, some of the names that will be revealed as leaks could appear as SBCs and objectives. Lately, EA Sports has dropped some expensive SBCs as part of the Thunderstruck promo, and the community will hope for a few reasonably priced ones.


Once we have more leaks, they will be added to the list mentioned here. Always remember that leaks are just an indication of the cards rumored to appear in a promo. The official stats, playstyles, and roles will be revealed only after the promo goes live on Ultimate Team.

The post EA FC 25 Ultimate Succession promo player leaks appeared first on Destructoid.

In celebration of the brand's 30th Anniversary, joint PlayStation CEOs, Hermen Hulst and Hideaki Nishino, sat down with BBC and talked extensively about the future of their company. They even tackled the fascinating yet highly controversial topic that is generative Artificial Intelligence in gaming.


With the recent rise of generative AI, many developers, designers, etc., worry that this brand-new technology may end up taking over their jobs. When asked about this, Hulst responded, "I suspect there will be a dual demand in gaming: one for AI-driven innovative experiences and another for handcrafted, thoughtful content." But then he added, "Striking the right balance between leveraging AI and preserving the human touch will be crucial."


Image via PlayStation Studios


This is a particula…
articles.title: PlayStation CEOs claim that AI will never replace the “human touch” of video game developers

Nintendo just published chapter 2 of it's "Ask the Developer" column with members of Acquire's team who worked in Mario & Luigi: Brothership. This time around, they talked about the visual identity of this RPG and ended up revealing some fascinating tidbits about its development.


Hitomi Furuta, one of the game's designers, confirmed that developing 3D visuals for Mario & Luigi: Brothership was a challenge and that Acquire was searching for a new Mario & Luigi style. "At one point we ended up trying to present an edgier, more rugged Mario instead. Then we received feedback from Nintendo that we should aim to make the art direction identifiable by fans as belonging to the Mario & Luigi series," said Furuta. 


Image via Nintendo


This revelation was accompanied by new concept art of Mario…

Nuclear Nightmare respawn system explained

The Chimy Avila World Tour SBC is now live in EA FC 25, and you can get a special card for your Ultimate Team squad. 


After a streak of expensive SBCs, we finally have a cheaper option on our hands. This card belongs to this season's World Tour theme, and it's the first special item for Avila this year. Let's take a look at how you can complete the challenge and if you should do so at all. 


EA FC 25 Chimy Avila World Tour SBC tasks


The Chimy Avila World Tour SBC has two tasks, and here are the required conditions. 


Task 1 - Argentina



Min. 1 Players from: Argentina


Min. Team Rating: 83



Task 2 - LaLiga



Min. 1 Players from: LALIGA EA SPORTS


Min. 1 Players: Team of the Week


Min. Team Rating: 84



EA FC 25 Chimy Avila World Tour SBC solutions


Here's a set of solutions you can use to complete the challenge. 


Task 1 - Argentina



Any 10 83-rated items


Guido Rodriguez 83



Task 2 - LaLiga



Any 86-rated TOTW item


Lukaku 82


Smalling 82


Jonsdottir 82


Zubimendi 81


Sellner 82


Hagering 82


Lohmann 82


de Ligt 84


Reiten 88


Ake 84



This Avila item is suitable for those who have yet to have a good forward for their LaLiga-based squads. The card has 86 overall, but Pace (86), Shooting (89), and Physicality (92) is more than decent. Additionally, he also offers 5* Weak Foot and the Advanced Forward++ role. You'll also get Chip Shot+, Finesse Shot, Power Shot, and Long Ball, and Avila can play as a LM and RM. 


He looks like a pretty useful utility option, and the relatively low overall rating means that the card might be eligible for upgrades as part of an upcoming evolution.

The three goblin leaders in Baldur's Gate 3 are tough to handle, especially Dror Ragzlin. He deals a ton of damage to anyone he hits. However, with the right preparations, you can make it through. Here's how to take out Dror Ragzlin in Baldur's Gate 3. 



How to defeat Dror Ragzlin in BG3


The easiest way to defeat Dror Ragzlin in BG3 is to push all his goblin soldiers down the pit while your tankiest characters deal with him. Make sure you always have someone ready to heal whoever is taking blows from his Faithbreaker Warhammer. Keep his goblin allies away from him to prevent his Aura of Leadership from boosting their damage. 


However, you must not push him down the pit if you want Dror Ragzlin's magic Warhammer, the Faithbreaker, or his Mind Flayer Parasite. Doing this makes him disa…

Even though The Sims 4 has been out for quite a while, it's gone through a bit of a resurgence with the newest events. It first took shape with the Happy At Home Login Event, and now it's happening again with Cozy Celebrations.

articles.description:
Division Rivals in EA FC 25 has always been a hot topic of discussion in the community, and matchmaking seems to be having a few issues.


Not many looked kindly to EA Sports increasing the number of wins required to get the weekly upgraded rewards. EA FC 25 players are reportedly facing opponents from higher divisions

As part of the Sew Delightful update to Disney Dreamlight Valley on December 4, Jack is finally reunited with Sally, his frayed-around-the-edges beau. Here’s how to unlock her, and the steps you’ll need to take to place her house in your Valley.
